justification: During the calibration and decision phases, indifference points obtained with the Cog-ED were used to "calibrate the 'cost' of cognitive effort for each individual," directly operationalizing subjective value of effort.
The methods specify that "In the N-back task, working memory load was varied across four levels in different task blocks," indicating this task serves as the measure of working-memory load.
The article reports that in the speech-in-noise task "effortful speech comprehension was also varied across blocks" by manipulating signal-to-noise ratios, using this task to index listening effort.
Participant screening notes that "Hearing was assessed using mobile audiometry (SHOEBOX, Inc.)… All participants had normal hearing," showing this device measured hearing ability.
